scripts.copyLib: shx cp -r ../src node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client && shx cp -r ../dist node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client && shx cp -r ../package* node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client && shx cp -r ../node_modules node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client
scripts.postinstall: shx rm -r node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client && shx mkdir -p node_modules/react-native-azure-iotcentral-client && npm run copyLib
